message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $11000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $11000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product.
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10200.
